getSemanticTags

java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getSemanticTags()
Description copied from class: GrammarElement
Obtains the semantic tags associated with the current element (and subelements)

Specified by:
getSemanticTags in class GrammarElement
Returns:
ArrayList with the semantic representations. It is composed of vectors containing 2 Strings: 0: text of the grammar element 1: its semantic interpretation Null if there is no semantic representation

getRegExpr

java.lang.String getRegExpr()
Obtains the regular expression corresponding to the alternative elements. It is build by adding the regular expressions of each element between parenthesis and separating them with "|"

Specified by:
getRegExpr in class GrammarElement
Returns:
string that contains the regular expression
